name: Tomb Raider IV: The Times exclusive level
description:
This script will install "Tomb Raider IV: The Times exclusive level" with support for modern resolution.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
dgVoodoo2: http://www.dege.freeweb.hu/
Tomb Raider 2-3-4 Widescreen Patch created by Mr.Blackfour : https://tombraiders.net/stella/downloads/widescreen.html
Other sources: https://www.tombraiderforums.com
Thanks to the people who contributed to play this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- "Tomb Raider IV: The Times exclusive level" has insufficient controller support, I invite you to use a keymapper. You will find profiles for x360 (Antimicro) and Steam Controller (sc-controller) in the "gamepad profiles" folder.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Tomb Raider IV - The Times exclusive level

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/TR4TIMESM1.BAT

task.description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at their defaults
task.name: wineexec

extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/

copy.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/
copy.src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/MS/x86/DDraw.dll

copy.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/
copy.src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/MS/x86/D3DImm.dll

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/"; mv dgVoodoo.conf dgVoodoo_original.conf

write_config.file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/dgVoodoo.conf

extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/

copy.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/

merge.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/gamepad profiles/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/gamepad profiles/
$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/gamepad profiles/

content:
custom-name: Tomb Raider IV - The Times exclusive level
files:
- setup: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/tomb_raider_4_times_bonus_level.zip
- dgv: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2_61.zip
- menu1: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/TR4TIMESM1.BAT
- menu2: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/TR4TIMESM2.BAT
- gpx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/gamepad%20profiles/tr4_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gpsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/gamepad%20profiles/tr4_steam.sccprofile
- gpreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/gamepad%20profiles/tr4_gamepad_readme.html
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Times%20exclusive%20level/tr4times.bmp
- patch: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20IV%20-%20The%20Last%20Revelation/TombRaider234_Patch.zip
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb Raider Level/TR4TIMESM1.BAT
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Preparing wineprefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: setup
- task:
    args: /desktop=TombRaider4Times,1024x780 $CACHE/Setup.exe
    description: Running setup of the game. Just proceed and keep all settings at
      their defaults
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/explorer.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/
    file: dgv
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/MS/x86/DDraw.dll
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/MS/x86/D3DImm.dll
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive
      Tomb Raider Level/"; mv dgVoodoo.conf dgVoodoo_original.conf
- write_config:
    data:
      DirectX:
        ForceVerticalSync: true
        Resolution: max_qhd_isf
        VRAM: 256
        dgVoodooWatermark: false
      General:
        CaptureMouse: false
        FullScreenMode: false
        ScalingMode: stretched_ar
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/dgVoodoo.conf
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/
    src: patch
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/
    src: menu1
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/
    src: menu2
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: wpp
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/gamepad profiles/
    src: gpreadme
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/gamepad profiles/
    src: gpx360
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Core Design/The Times - Exclusive Tomb
      Raider Level/gamepad profiles/
    src: gpsteam
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: wallpaper
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\tr4times.bmp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 255 255 255
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ddraw
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
